author: vkhristenko
body:
adding constexpr to

- HcalCalibrations
- HcalRecoParam

only for these 2 in order to keep changes minimal for hcal reco at this point
https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/blob/master/RecoLocalCalo/HcalRecProducers/src/HBHEPhase1Reconstructor.cc#L547
`reco_->reconstruct` needs only these 2, the rest sits in the `HBHEChannelInfo` that has been accomodated via https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/23495
title: constexpr for Hcal Calib and Cond
